channel.title: Hosting a server?
channel.description:
Hello, and I need to be able to host a private server on my website. something like www.MY SITE.com. I know how to make a server and how to edit it and stuff, but I just don't know how to upload my server to my site and be able to use a server IP from there.
Please help, or if I didn't explain, post because I will be looking on this topic for a while
